q: the tower district, perea, 31, remained optimistic. surrounded by a large crowd of supporters at palomino's restaurant, perea said he knew that he would be behind Ashley Swearengin in the count of absentee ballots. i'm optimistic that as the evening goes on that i can close that gap, perea said. the election-evening events marked the end of two campaigns that went full-speed-ahead in the final 90 days.
